subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James’s relegation to the bench for the closing seconds of Game 4 was as surprising as the Pacers bouncing back from being routed in Game 3.
snippet: LeBron James’s relegation to the bench for the closing seconds of Game 4 was as surprising as the Pacers bouncing back from being routed in Game 3.
